featured.text: As beautiful as they are, people here chop down capirana trees for their wood.
(3) How long did it take the two men to cut down the giant capirana tree?
Our destination was a 150-foot tall capirana tree, by far the biggest tree around.

definition.zh_def: 一種小型的水生植物，通常生長在淡水環境中。
definition.en_def: A type of small aquatic plant typically found in freshwater environments.
definition.example: The capirana thrives in the shallow waters of the lake.
